column1: Now it happened when the child was still very little that her father was obliged to go to the capital of the kingdom. As it was so long a journey
column2: neither his wife nor his child could go with him and he departed alone
column3: promising to bring them many pretty gifts on his return.The mother had never been away from the neighborhood and was not able to get rid of some fear when she thought of the long journey her husband must take. At the same time
column5: she could not but feel pride and satisfaction that it was her husband who was the first man in all that region to go to the rich city where the king and the nobles lived
column6: and where there were so many beautiful and marvelous things to be seen.At last
column7: when the good wife knew that her husband would return
column8: she dressed her child gaily in the best clothes she had and herself in the blue dress that she knew he liked very much.It is not possible to describe the joy of the good woman when she saw her husband return safe and sound.
